title: Beaver
description:
A brown beaver with buckteeth and a wide paddle-like tail. Can be used in the context of actual beavers, or metaphorically to evoke qualities of beavers like working hard, as in the expression beavering away. 

Commonly associated with Canada, as beavers are a national emblem of the country. May also be used in reference to the vagina, which is an informal sense of the word beaver.
apple_vendor_description: The beaver emoji on Apple devices is a charming and industrious creature with a distinct, glossy sheen. Its fur is rendered with subtle shading, and its iconic flat tail is depicted with a realistic texture, all enhanced by Appleâ€™s smooth gradients and soft rounded edges. This beaver embodies hard work, determination, and building, making it a fitting symbol for industrious projects, perseverance, or even a playful nod to someone being exceptionally busy.
